name: GBSenku
description:
Updated: 

  • Added sounds
  • Fixed last level bug
  • Improved peg selection
  • Two new levels

A little #puzzlescript game based in Senku (Peg Solitaire) using only 4 colors.

Made for the miniLD 50 LD48 contest: LD48 game page

Controls:

X -> Select/Deselect peg

Arrows -> Move selected pegs

Art + Code: @PixelArtM
